column1: Section:PL-Transportation Asset Inventory, Data Integration (3 Reqs)

column4: Store one or more cross references to a unique asset identified in existing management systems. For example, a Federal Bridge  number, etc.

Integrate with the ERP real estate and facilities management function to access more detailed information about facilities that are  on the transportation network; examples are travel centers, rest areas, train stations, bus stations, toll plazas, etc.
Allow for programmatic access by other ERP functions or other WVDOT applications to the asset inventory information for on- demand inquiry, validation and reporting.
